mapper.select: SELECT t2.id, t2.tax_name, t2.credit_code, t2.link_man, t2.link_mobile, t2.tax_create_date FROM tb_company_tax t1 INNER JOIN tb_tax t2 ON t1.tax_id = t2.id WHERE t1.company_id = #{companyId} GROUP BY t2.id ORDER BY t2.tax_create_date DESC

SELECT t3.id, t3.tax_name, t3.credit_code, t3.link_man, t3.link_mobile, t3.tax_create_date FROM tb_company_unionpay t1 INNER JOIN tb_tax_unionpay t2 ON t1.tax_unionpay_id = t2.id INNER JOIN tb_tax t3 ON t2.tax_id = t3.id WHERE t1.company_id = #{companyId} GROUP BY t3.id ORDER BY t3.tax_create_date DESC

SELECT t1.* FROM tb_company_unionpay t1 INNER JOIN tb_tax_unionpay t2 ON t1.tax_unionpay_id = t2.id WHERE t1.company_id = #{companyId} AND t2.tax_unionpay_id = #{taxUnionpayId} AND t2.unionpay_bank_type = #{unionpayBankType}
SELECT unionpay_bank_type FROM tb_tax_unionpay t1 INNER JOIN tb_company_unionpay t2 ON t1.id = t2.tax_unionpay_id WHERE t1.bool_enable = 1 AND t2.company_id = #{companyId} AND t1.tax_id = #{taxId}
